findings.title: Admin Login Timeout Too Long
findings.description: Admin session timeout is set too high, increasing risk of session hijacking.
findings.reference: SonicWall Best Practices Guide - Administrative Access
findings.remediation: Navigate to Device > Settings > Administration and set 'Administrator inactivity timeout' to 15 minutes or less.

findings.title: Multi-Factor Authentication Not Enforced
findings.description: One-Time Password (TOTP) is not required for administrator login.
findings.remediation: Navigate to Device > Settings > Administration and enable 'Require OTP for login'.

findings.title: Admin Session Preemption Not Configured
findings.description: Administrator session preemption behavior is not configured.
findings.remediation: Consider configuring admin session preemption policy.

findings.title: Login Banner Not Configured
findings.description: A login warning banner is not configured.
findings.remediation: Configure login banner via Device > Settings > Administration.

findings.title: NAT Policies Review Recommended
findings.description: NAT policies are configured. Review to ensure only necessary services are exposed.
findings.remediation: Audit NAT policies to minimize attack surface.

findings.title: DPI-SSL Client Inspection Disabled
findings.description: DPI-SSL Client inspection is disabled. Encrypted traffic will not be inspected.
findings.recommended_value: Enable DPI-SSL for encrypted traffic inspection
findings.remediation: Enable DPI-SSL Client inspection under Firewall Settings > DPI-SSL.

findings.title: DPI-SSL Server Inspection Disabled
findings.recommended_value: Enable DPI-SSL Server for inbound inspection
findings.remediation: Enable DPI-SSL Server inspection if hosting internal services.

findings.title: Syslog Server Configured
findings.description: Syslog server is configured to send logs to external server.
findings.remediation: Verify syslog server is receiving logs and retention is adequate.

findings.title: Analytics Integration Not Configured
findings.description: SonicWall Analytics/NSM integration is not configured.
findings.remediation: Consider enabling NSM or Analytics for centralized management.

findings.title: Weak TLS Ciphers Enabled
findings.description: Found 18 weak or obsolete cipher suites enabled.
findings.recommended_value: Disable weak ciphers (NULL, EXPORT, RC4, DES)
findings.remediation: Review and disable weak cipher suites in TLS settings.
